channel.title: Idlewild on mattischrome

item.title: Understated Classics #7: 100 Broken Windows by Idlewild
item.description: Idewild are a solid band who have released four or five albums that I could consider for this series. I’m even in the sleeve credits of one: Post-Electric Blues, if you’re asking.
